title: Divine Kundan and Gemstone Manga Maalai - Traditional South Indian Necklace
materials: Cultured Pearls. Gold features intricate Hyderabadi polish for lasting lustre.
features: Classic Manga Maalai design featuring alternating Mango motifs set with sparkling Kundan, vibrant emeralds and rubies. Delicately crafted pearl droplets enhance the necklace's elegance. The pendant features a geometric design embedded with gemstones in Kundan setting.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant accents of emerald green
a timeless and auspicious color palette in South Indian jewelry.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. Makes a stunning statement piece for any special celebration.
description: This Manga Maalai is a symbol of prosperity and good fortune, making it an ideal heirloom piece. Handcrafted by skilled artisans using traditional Kundan setting techniques, guaranteeing exceptional quality and durability. The vibrant gemstones and pearl accents enhance its beauty, making it a cherished addition to any jewelry collection.
